Articles.Content: I notice when I was launch. Something tiny dot. Is it glitch or Minmus?

Most definitely Minmus.

Nice job getting that picture too
Thank you
Ah... I always loved that little dot...
hehe Maybe I should repost picture without words on picture. For anyone who want copy of picture

I notice when I was launch. Something tiny dot. Is it glitch or Minmus?

Wow I never actually noticed that you could see Minmus from Kerbin , nice screenshot!
Here picture without words
Go to a manned capsule, Mk1 cockpit has the widest field of view, scroll to maximum zoom, then hold down the mouse wheel. You'll be able to see that the dot is, indeed, Minmus.

it is mimimus, great picture and Awesome looking rocket

If i may know, what is the mass to LKO and what is the starting mass?
Dat beautiful, KW, non-stock rocket.

They say that the Mun is a harsh mistress...

And the Min is one cute miss...
AWesome! good picture, wich mod are you using?
Jool is visible from Kerbin as well. Probably Eve, too, but I haven't seen it. Not sure about the smaller bodies.

Did you know, you can see Jool from LKO from any distance, and Eve and Duna if they are close to Kerbin.

Edit: RoboRay ninja'd me ...

What Mod I have? I'll list have.

Mod: [0.19.1] KW Rocketry

Mod cant be seen in picture but I use: [0.19] MechJeb 1.9.8, RemoteTech (in payload)

Other Mod I have but I didn't use for this mission: ISA MapSat 3.3.4, [0.19] H.O.M.E. Start Kit 1.0.2, Orbital Assembly Building (OAB), Modular Multiwheels (CleverBobCat edition) TruckCab Update V0.4 [LEGACY 0.18], [sT] SPACETECH Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Escape Pod (V1.8), [0.19.1] KerbX (a SpaceX analogue), Lazor Cam, Robotic Arms Pack, [0.19.1] NovaPunch 1.5 Beta (KSP 0.19 and Linux Compatibility Fixes!, and many more. I cant remember list

But my most favorite and use very often Mod are KW Rocketry and [0.19] MechJeb 1.9.8

Did you know, you can see Jool from LKO from any distance, and Eve and Duna if they are close to Kerbin.

I did not knew that. I'm gona try to see that !
How do you see Jool from Kerbin?
That's minmus! I love looking at if from the cockpit.

How do you see Jool from Kerbin?

clear sky

yeah it could even be Jool, how can you be so sure it's Minmus?

Wow, Jool's visible from Kerbin? I have never seen that. Something to look for I guess, or I could download one of the space telescope mods.

When I first saw the little dot that is Minmus, I played around with the map view trying to see if it was indeed that tiny moon. Several minutes later, my prediction was proven correct! (I felt so proud)

That is a pretty cool picture. I think that's one of my favorite features in KSP. Looking up in the sky and seeing the mun, and knowing you can go there. That it's not just some painting in a skybox, it's a goal and a reminder.
Whenever I'm building a plane, and Minimus is in the sky, its goes surprisingly well. Whenever Minimus is not out, many kerbles died fiery, horrible deaths.
yeah, thats Minmus
Interesting, I've never noticed this. Gonna look for it now! Gotta be Minmus.
